LanguageData.InspiredUnique.Settings.CraftChance.Labe: Chance to craft a unique weapon
LanguageData.InspiredUnique.Settings.ShowWeaponCustom: When enabled, a customization menu will appear when crafting unique weapons, allowing you to select traits and rename the weapon.
LanguageData.InspiredUnique.Settings.CustomizationMen: These settings only apply when the Weapon Customization Menu is enabled:
LanguageData.InspiredUnique.Settings.MaxGeneratedTrai: Controls how many non-conflicting traits are generated for the selection list.
